name: smartaccounting
description: Smart Accounting System with German Tax Compliance

scripts.smoke:frontend: npm ci --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run migrate:prod && npm run smoke:frontend && docker build --tag smartaccounting:prod .
scripts.test:postgres: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d db && node scripts/wait-for-postgres.js docker-compose.test.yml db && PGUSER=postgres PGPASSWORD=postgres NODE_ENV=test DATABASE_URL=postgres://localhost:5433/smartaccounting_test USE_SQLITE=false npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && PGUSER=postgres PGPASSWORD=postgres NODE_ENV=test DATABASE_URL=postgres://localhost:5433/smartaccounting_test USE_SQLITE=false npx jest tests/integration/runtimeGuards.test.js && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down
scripts.migrate:postgres: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d db && node scripts/wait-for-postgres.js docker-compose.test.yml db && PGUSER=postgres PGPASSWORD=postgres NODE_ENV=test DATABASE_URL=postgres://localhost:5433/smartaccounting_test USE_SQLITE=false npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down
scripts.seed:demo:postgres: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d db && node scripts/wait-for-postgres.js docker-compose.test.yml db && DEMO_MODE=true ALLOW_DEMO_SEED=true PGUSER=postgres PGPASSWORD=postgres NODE_ENV=test DATABASE_URL=postgres://localhost:5433/smartaccounting_test USE_SQLITE=false node scripts/seed-demo-prod.js && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down

author: SmartAccounting Team
